about_the_game:
Even more variety in OMSI 2 with more AI humans and bus drivers!

In the 8th part of the OMSI 2 download pack series, the variety becomes even greater, because more AI humans are waiting to be released into the maps. In addition, the pack offers new male and female bus drivers.

And from version 1.1 onwards, special AI passers-by and bus drivers for OMSI London (an English policeman "Bobby" and a UK teenager) are also included.

The new AI people - 4 women, 3 men and a child - are included in 60 variations in terms of clothing and appearance and, as always, have over 200 professionally recorded voice files in German and English.
They are therefore not only suitable for German maps, but also bring authenticity to English-speaking OMSI fans. For OMSI-London, for example, there are 4 new bus drivers with original logos and uniforms to choose from. In addition, London police officers and passers-by.

The new male and female bus drivers provide more variety in the cockpit.
We follow the wishes of the OMSI community and therefore there are male and female drivers for the following transport companies:
  • MVG Munich
  • Vestische Herten
  • WSW Wuppertal
  • BVG Berlin
  • HVV Hamburg Hochbahn
  • ASEAG Aachen
  • London Public Transport

All drivers in different versions with corresponding uniforms.
This makes every OMSI map even more realistic.
If you want, you can also use the new bus drivers as normal passengers.

The OMSI 2 download pack Vol. 8 not only contains new passengers and passers-by for your OMSI map, your buses will also be driven in style by the new staff.

Features
  • New AI passers-by (4 women, 3 men, 1 child)
  • 3 new bus drivers and 1 new female bus driver
  • Drivers can also be used as passers-by/passengers
  • Over 60 different variations/possibilities
  • Original uniforms of well-known transport companies
  • Sample configuration files for popular maps
  • Over 200 professionally recorded voice files in German and English
  • From version 1.1. extended support for OMSI-London

NOTE:
For use on existing OMSI maps, the AI humans of the OMSI download pack Vol. 8 must be manually integrated into the maps. Please follow the instructions for this.
The distribution of the AI humans of the OMSI 2 - Downloadpack Vol. 8 is not permitted individually or together with free maps for copyright reasons.

Even more variety in OMSI 2 with more AI humans and bus drivers!

The new AI people - 4 women, 3 men and a child - are included in 60 variations in terms of clothing and appearance and, as always, have over 200 professionally recorded voice files in German and English.
They are therefore not only suitable for German maps, but also bring authenticity to English-speaking OMSI fans. For OMSI-London, for example, there are 4 new bus drivers with original logos and uniforms to choose from. In addition, London police officers and passers-by.

The new male and female bus drivers provide more variety in the cockpit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core e.g. Core i5 with 2.8 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 1,024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Processor: Quad-core with 3.0 GHz
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 2,048 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
